name: Boston Brotherhood
description: pre-order RSC’s “Boston Brotherhood.” A monument to Boston's strength, compassion and character. One State. One City. One People. RSC will not collect a single penny from this effort. 100 percent of the profits from “Boston Brotherhood” will be donated to Boston’s One Fund, a body set up by Mayor Tom Menino and Governor Deval Patrick to help those most affected by the tragic events. Production on these t-shirts will begin on May 10th. You will receive your order between May 15-18th.

name: Divide and Conquer Zip-Up
description:
Fight the occupation. Gain and maintain. “Divide & Conquer.”

MODEL IS WEARING A SIZE SMALL.

for a more snug fit, we recommend buying one size smaller.

name: Riot Squad Crew Neck Sweatshirt
description:
Say no to the status quo. Join the resistance. “RSC Riot Squad.”

Printed on an eco-friendly Alternative Apparel crew neck with a waterbase ink, these are the SOFTEST sweatshirts in the world. 

MODEL IS WEARING A SIZE MEDIUM.

name: Strike Force
description:
Line ‘em up and strike ‘em down. “RSC Strike Force.”

Printed with waterbase ink on a super soft heather gray poly-cotton blend t-shirt.

MODEL IS WEARING A SIZE MEDIUM.

name: Stand & Deliver
description:
Don’t stay down. Rise up. “Stand and Deliver.”

Printed with a discharge ink on a super soft cardinal poly-cotton blend t-shirt.

MODEL IS WEARING A SIZE MEDIUM.

name: Riot Squad
description:
Say no to the status quo. Join the resistance. “RSC Riot Squad.”

Printed with waterbase ink on a super soft Lt Olive poly-cotton blend t-shirt.

MODEL IS WEARING A SIZE MEDIUM.
